replies.body: Morde has suffered enough and with Rylais removal he's gonna suffer a lot more
But but, this way he can be another teemo
Teemo's  a literal devil and he wouldn't kick a dead horse.   So why are you?
Showing Mordekaiser some love apparently is frowned upon.
Just at Riot HQ.  Also if we wanted a new skin Raid Boss Morde is what the few who actually played him would want

That actualy might have some potential now that I have time to remember that old rhyme about Bunny Fufu.  lol

Lil Mordekaiser,
Lurking round the jungle,
Ultin on your carries,
then Qin' them on their heads!

Curse you for making me smile today!  XP
